name: 破碎镜界 Mirror Broken World
name_original: 破碎镜界 Mirror Broken World
description:
The player on the left is the mirror knight in the real world, and the player on the right is the Reflection in the mirror world. 

For the Mirror Knight, the gameplay is strategically building the character (the Reflection) and assisting in boss fights. 

The gameplay of Reflection is to fight monsters and prevent them from reaching the real world. The combination provides a two-player co-op and chaotic experience.
